From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Old French

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

nettoier

  1. alternative form of netoiier

Conjugation

[edit]

This verb conjugates as a first-group verb ending in -er. This verb has a stressed present stem netti distinct from the unstressed stem nettoi, as well as other irregularities. Old French conjugation varies significantly by date and by region. The following conjugation should be treated as a guide.

    Conjugation of nettoier (see also Appendix:Old French verbs)
simple compound
infinitive nettoier avoir nettoié
gerund en nettoiant gerund of avoir + past participle
present participle nettoiant
past participle nettoié
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu il nos vos il
simple
tenses 		present netti, nettoi nettïes, nettoies nettïe, nettoie nettoions nettoiez nettïent, nettoient
imperfect nettoioie, nettoieie, nettoioe, nettoieve nettoioies, nettoieies, nettoioes, nettoieves nettoioit, nettoieit, nettoiot, nettoieve nettoiiiens, nettoiiens nettoiiiez, nettoiiez nettoioient, nettoieient, nettoioent, nettoievent
preterite nettoiai nettoias nettoia nettoiames nettoiastes nettoierent
future nettoierai nettoieras nettoiera nettoierons nettoieroiz, nettoiereiz, nettoierez nettoieront
conditional nettoieroie, nettoiereie nettoieroies, nettoiereies nettoieroit, nettoiereit nettoieriiens, nettoieriens nettoieriiez, nettoieriez nettoieroient, nettoiereient
compound
tenses 		present perfect present tense of avoir + past participle
pluperfect imperfect tense of avoir + past participle
past anterior preterite tense of avoir + past participle
future perfect future tense of avoir + past participle
conditional perfect conditional tense of avoir + past participle
subjunctive que jo que tu qu’il que nos que vos qu’il
simple
tenses 		present netti, nettoi nettis, nettois nettit, nettoit nettoions nettoiez nettïent, nettoient
imperfect nettoiasse nettoiasses nettoiast nettoiissons, nettoiissiens nettoiissoiz, nettoiissez, nettoiissiez nettoiassent
compound
tenses 		past present subjunctive of avoir + past participle
pluperfect imperfect subjunctive of avoir + past participle
imperative – tu – nos vos –
— nettïe, nettoie — nettoions nettoiez —
